description: Learn how to make crispy vegetable tempura in just 30 minutes. Serve it with a zingy vegan mayo and caper dip for a fresh twist on a Japanese classic.
name: Vegan Veggie Tempura Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine mayonnaise, capers, dill and lemon juice in a small bowl. Season tempura vegetables with pepper and scatter over extra dill. Serve with sauce.
